headline: Madison Mid Cap Fund Q4 2024 Investment Strategy Letter
summary: The Madison Mid Cap Fund (class I) decreased 1.86% in the fourth quarter of 2024, compared to the 0.62% increase in the Russell Midcap Index. Read more here.

raw.headline: Madison Mid Cap Fund Q4 2024 Investment Strategy Letter

headline: Madison Covered Call & Equity Income Fund Q4 2024 Investment Strategy Letter
summary: The Mag 7 stocks rose more than 67% in 2024, allowing S&P 500 to post a 25% return, its second consecutive year of 20%+ gains, a feat not accomplished since the Dotcom Bubble in 1997/98.

headline: The Supreme Court Gears Up To Resolve Circuit Split On Class Injury Requirements
summary: On January 24, 2025, the Supreme Court granted certiorari in Laboratory Corp. of America v. Davis, No. 24-0304, which may result in the resolution of a long-standing circuit split on a dispute key to...
